dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The remains of the Scorpion King’s decimated army retreat into the desert. ARDETH BEY (0.s.) For three months they wandered the desert, slowly dying, until the Scorpion King himself was the last man left alive. Alone in the middle of a vast wasteland, the Scorpion Kin crawls on his hands and knees, then he looks up into the heavens, raises his fist in anger, and BELLOWS A CURSE. ARDETH BEY (0.s.) On death’s door, he made a pact with the great god Anubis.  oN The Scorpion King sees a live SCORPION crawling towards h He looks back up to the heavens and sneers, then grabs th wriggling thing with his bare hands. His face grimaces as STINGS HIM. He shoves the scorpion into his mouth and che

He lifts h scimitar and SHRIEKS in triumph. _

dialogues.text: The next year, the Scorpion King stormed northward with the Army of Anubis. And like a great flood, washed away all that lay before them. CUT WIDE: Thousands of hideous Anubis Warriors swarm thro the fantastic and sprawling City of Thebes, now in ruins. Buildings BURN. Monuments COLLAPSE. People SCREAM.

dialogues.text: He defeated his enemies, united all of Egypt, became the first Pharaoh, and created a religion that would last for a thousand years. The SCREEN fills with the horrific face of an Anubis Warr he SHRIEKS and then DISSOLVES into BLACK SAND, revealing:

dialogues.text: ANCIENT RUINS along the banks of the Nile. Deserted excep for THREE CAMELS. SUPERIMPOSED ON THE SCREEN are the WORD EGYPT — 1935 INT. EGYPTIAN TEMPLE — DAY Inside the temple, dozens of GIANT PILLARS rise up from t rock strewn floor to the cracked ceiling above. A shaft o dusty sunlight shines in through a doorway. A small FIGUR in a pith helmet enters, holding a TORCH. The Figure move through the pillars and enters a FISSURE in a far wall. INT. CATACOMBS — DAY We follow the pith helmeted Figure as he slowly creeps through spooky catacombs. The walls are covered in dark hieroglyphics. A scary NOISE is heard. The Figure freezes then turns around and faces us: it’s an adorable little eight-year-old boy. This is ALEXANDER O'CONNELL. Alex looks around, eyes wide. It’s dark and quiet. And th HAND GRABS HIM. Alex SCREAMS. It’s O'CONNELL, looking das and handsome and wearing a sleeveless shirt.

dialogues.text: Alex, I told you to wait up in the temple.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: But Dad--!

dialogues.speaker: O'CONNELL
dialogues.text: No “buts”, it’s dangerous down here. Now be good and I’1l get ya something when we get home.

dialogues.speaker: O'CONNELL
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: But Dad--!

dialogues.text: You have a tattoo! bene  Ne Alex points to a very cool TATTOO emblazoned across O’Connell‘s muscular upper right arm: a mariner’s compass pointing down with falcon’s wings pointing up, forming a pyramid. In the center of the pyramid is the Eye of Isis. 0’ CONNELL I told you, I was only three or four when this thing was slapped on me. I didn’t have a say in it and neither do you. O'Connell spins Alex around and gently sends him packing.

dialogues.speaker: O'CONNELL
dialogues.text: Now back to the temple big guy. And keep your fingers off the furniture. INT. dialogues.speaker: Unknown

TEMPLE — DAY Inside the temple, next to a large gathering of ancient artifacts, Alex is building some sort of strange CONTRAPT out of bamboo shoots, mummy wrappings, and rotted bones.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: No swords. No scimitars. No bows and arrows. How's a kid supposed to have any fun around here? He's also keeping an eye on some RATS off in the corner. Suddenly, VOICES are heard. Frightened, Alex looks around he spots a forty foot high WOODEN SCAFFOLDING. He quickly scurries over and starts to climb up. At the top, Alex bellycrawls across it and looks down over the other side: Red, Spivey, Abdul, and Muhammad enter the temple, slow a easy. Guns and scimitars up. Real professionals. A truly vicious looking crew. Alex’s eyes widen in fear. Muhammad heads for the fissure in the wall. Red turns to him.

dialogues.speaker: RED
dialogues.text: Don’t light it until I yell at ya. Muhammad nods and slips into the fissure. Spivey has been staring at Alex’s contraption. Inside it, a piece of CHEE sits on a plate. Spivey grabs the cheese. The contraption GOES CFF. A bamboo shoot SLAPS DOWN HARD onto Spivey’s ha --THWACK!! It’s a rat trap. We CUT AWAY on Spivey’s SCREA

dialogues.text: WHAM! A huge slab hits the ground. Tarantulas and scorpio flee. Poison asps HISS. The room is filled with creepy ha eaten mummies. O’Connell holds a pry bar. O’ CONNELL ~all I’m sayin’ is maybe it’s time to be normal. You know, normal mom, normal dad, regular everyday folks? ‘

dialogues.text: Evy gestures at the creepy, infested room, incredulous. Evy And give up all of this!? Her hands whip through cobwebs, which stick to her finger she tries to wipe them off as O’Connell enters the room. O*’ CONNELL Remind me again why you’ve been so obsessed with coming here? EvY Ever since I had that dream, this place is all I can think of. I feel like I've been here. ~I know I've been here.

dialogues.text: Evy, nobody’s been here, not in over three thousand years. Evy grabs a TORCH HOLDER on the wall and pulls it. A hidd TRAP DOOR suddenly OPENS, revealing a secret passage. EvVY Then how do I seem to know exactly where I’m going?

dialogues.text: Something hit me! They all look around, suspicious.  INT. CATACOMB — DAY Muhammed creeps up to the~hole that O’Connell just create He pulls out several tightly wrapped STICKS OF DYNAMITE. INT. PRIEST CHAMBER — DAY O'Connell steps into a dark chamber.

dialogues.text: -maybe it's your ancestors calling. Yer half Egyptian, maybe it’s some sorta Primal thing. Evy sticks her torch into the room and pans it around. As torch passes in front of CAMERA the SCREEN FLASHES and we i four thousand years: The room now looks gloriously new and utterly fantastic. On t far wall, an EGYPTIAN PRINCESS comes out of a DOOR. dialogues.text: Another one of those.., visions? ’ Evy quickly covers with a smile.

dialogues.text: Did you acquire it!? Before they can even answer the ground suddenly SHAKES. R Spivey and the High Priest stop in their tracks. The grou SHAKES AGAIN. More violent now. Closer. The Diggers in the pit look around, wide-eyed. Then somet familiar happens: A MOUND OF SAND BEGINS TO RISE UP out o the bottom of the pit. The Diggers stare at it, transfixe And then the mound BURSTS OPEN AND A THOUSAND SCARABS EXP UP OUT OF IT.  14 The Diggers SCREAM in terror and frantically try to scram up out of the sandy pit, grasping for purchase, legs and hands churning away in the sand, their progress nightmari slow. The SWEEPING. FLOODLIGHTS make it all the more kine and creepy. And then the hideous bugs overtake the SCREAM Diggers and start eating them alive. The Digge opens his mouth, --SCARABS POUR OUT OF IT. Red and Spivey SCREAM LOUDER. Men in BLACK TURBANS race forward, using FLAME-THROWERS t chase the CHITTERING scarabs back into the pit. Behind th men in RED TURBANS begin to SHOUT with excitement and poi to a LARGE CRANE swiveling over some ruins; a big ROCK hanging from its claw. The High Priest sees this and is completely elated and distracted, he quickly scurries off for the crane.

A Serva bows for Meela and opens the back door to a créme colored Rolls Royce convertible. Meela dismisses him offhand, the stops near the pit and grabs the gold book.

dialogues.text: Hello. Jonathan gets a little excited.

dialogues.speaker: JONATHAN
dialogues.text: Upstairs! In my office! There's a@ safe. It’s behind a rather flattering painting of me. The combination is 3-20-58.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: i i 5

dialogues.text: Meela starts to stick the asp up to Jonathan's neck, his bulge out of his head.

dialogues.text: Hey! Wait! I told you! I TOLD you!

dialogues.text: And your point is?

dialogues.speaker: JONATHAN
dialogues.text: My point js I told you so you wouldn't kill me!

O'Connell snatches it right out of the air, holding it by it’s neck O'Connell looks into Meela’s gorgeous eyes. O’CONNELL Nice Asp. EVERYTHING HAPPENS AT ONCE: Turban #1 lets go of Jonathan draws a pistol. O’Connell throws the Asp at him, which tangles around his“hand. The man SCREAMS and flaiis with snake. The snake BITES HIS FACE. The man SCREAMS LOUDER. Turban #2 pulls the knife away from Jonathan's neck. Jon immediately throws himself backwards, the chair topples o and spills Jonathan ‘onto’the floor. Turban #2 FLINGS the knife at O'Connell. O’Connell snatches it out of the air. FLINGS it right back at him, impaling him in the chest. H falls to the floor in front of Jonathan, who doesn’t even slow down, just crawls right up and over the dead guy. dialogues.text: But--{

dialogues.text: Ardeth Bey?? Then something dawns on him and he grits his teeth in ang 0’ CONNELL Don't tell me. Ardeth Bey strides up.

dialogues.text: Yes, once again someone has removed Imhotep from his grave. O'Connell shakes his head. Jonathan is incredulous.

dialogues.speaker: JONATHAN
dialogues.text: I don’t mean to point fingers, but isn’t it your job to make sure that this doesn’t happen?

dialogues.text: He was well hidden under the ruins of Hamunaptra. But the woman who is with them, she knew exactly where to look. O’ CONNELL Just like Evy knew exactly where to find that bracelet.

dialogues.speaker: . ARDETH BEY

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: Well they didn’t get it.

dialogues.text: 32 Ardeth Bey is shocked, he gently grabs Alex’s wrist and checks out the bracelet. Alex is very excited. When I put it on, I saw a mirage, the pyramids at Giza, then whoosh! Across the desert to Karnac.

dialogues.text: (scolding him) We'll talk about this later. (then to Ardeth Bey) You have any idea where these guys went?

dialogues.text: That is why I came to seek you out. We traced them here to London, then we lost then. He pulls out a PHOTOGRAPH of the High Priest.

dialogues.text: Trust him. He spends more time in that museum than he does at home. EXT. LONDON STREETS — NIGHT LIGHTNING FLASHES across a mint condition Rolls Royce Sil Shadow as it races through the streets of London. INT. ROLLS ROYCE — NIGHT O'Connell is at the wheel. Ardeth Bey is in the front passenger’s seat, he looks over and sees O’Connell’s TATT partially sticking out of his rolled-up shirt sleeve. Ardeth Bey looks very surprised.

dialogues.speaker: ARDETH BEY
dialogues.text: O'Connell, if I said to you: “I am a stranger traveling from the east, seeking that which is lost...” O'Connell is stunned, then confused, he stares out throug the rain whipped windshield, his mind racing back in time

dialogues.speaker: O'CONNELL
dialogues.text: I would reply..: “I am a stranger traveling from the west, it is < whom you seek.”

dialogues.text: “Then we shall meet in the circle.”

dialogues.speaker: O'CONNELL
dialogues.text: “For the sake of the Widow's son." O'Connell looks at Ardeth Bey, blown away, as if in a dre OQ’ CONNELL My father taught me that. It’s one of my first memories, my only recollection of him. I never knew what it meant.

dialogues.text: It means, my friend, that you are a Masonic Templar. He rolls up his own sleeve, to reveal an identical tattoo

dialogues.speaker: ARDETH BEY
dialogues.text: A “Medjai*, like myself. Alex leans forward from the back seat, very excited.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: Wow look at that! What’s a Masonic Templar, Dad?

dialogues.speaker: ARDETH BEY
dialogues.text: Dedicated to the Brotherhood of Man. Under the all seeing eye of God. Alex turns to Jonathan, very excited.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: My dad’s an ancient warrior!

dialogues.text: What’s a job like that pay? O'Connell SWATS Jonathan’s hand away.

dialogues.speaker: O'CONNELL
dialogues.text: I am not a Templar. Some joker slapped this tattoo on me when I was put in the orphanage in Hong Kong.

dialogues.text: It is not a tattoo, but a precise brand, there is only one print of it in all the world. It would only have been given to a Medjai father to place on his son. O’ CONNELL All I remember, is that it hurt like hell.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: When you‘re a Templar, whaddaya get to do?

dialogues.text: Your fate is to be a Protector of Man, your destiny, to fight evil, always. O'Connell looks dubious. O’CONNELL Sounds great.

dialogues.speaker: ARDETH BEY
dialogues.text: It is in the blood, passed down from generation to generation, from father to son. Alex looks elated.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: Sounds really great! That means </m gonna get a tattoo! 0’ CONNELL You are got going to get a tattoo.

dialogues.text: To earn your brand, you must perform a feat which is both brave and wise. O’Connell plays along.

dialogues.text: That's right, Alex, so I want you to stay here and protect the car. Jonathan quickly raises his hand.

dialogues.speaker: JONATHAN
dialogues.text: If you see someone come running out screaming, it’s just me. 0’ CONNELL ' Jonathan, maybe you should ‘stay here with Alex.

dialogues.speaker: JONATHAN

For a BEAT, th is nothing there, and then the SCORPION KING slowly lower himself down from the ceiling, still partly hidden in sha From the waist up, he’s exactly how we remember him; a hu muscular, vicious warrior, but from the waist down, --he’ avery large SCORPION. But they’re both starting to strength. They can’t hold on much longer. Evy is desperate to dash to her husband and help him, but stalactites keep falling. O'Connell sees the look in her eyes.

She turns and starts to run back the way she came The room VIOLENTLY SHAKES. Anck loses her balance. Her ar flail wildly as she teeters on the edge of the scorpion filled moat, she has just long enough to realize the ramifications if she falls in, --and then she falls in. Anck SCREAMS and FLAILS wildly as the mass of scorpions envelop and STING her. She sinks into the mass of wriggli scorpions and, still SCREAMING, vanishes under them. INT. ENTRANCEWAY — DAY Inside the entranceway, BLACK VAPOR AND MASSIVE FOLIAGE a being SUCKED through every archway and down into a huge h in the middle of the chamber. Our heroes climb up out of a small hole in the floor, a s gold arch behind them blocks them from getting nailed by flying debris. They have to SCREAM above the HOWLING WIND EvY How are we going to get out of here!? O'Connell spots some stairs inside the arch. O*’ CONNELL Follow me! They all race into the arch and up the stairs.

Th mouths drop open as they look out and see: THE ENTIRE OASIS IS BEING SUCKED INTO THE PYRAMID: palm trees, bushes, shrubs, massive quantities of dirt and deb as well as ancient corpses and HISSING pygmy skeletons. The pyramid itself begins to SHAKE VIOLENTLY.

Izzy pulls a lever, SHOOTING FLAME out the bellow and up into a hole in the blimp. The blimp sta to rise quickly. And that’s when Jonathan jumps. He slams into the side of the boat, loses his grip and falls, --bu his feet get tangled in some fishing net along the side o the boat and now he’s hanging upside down.  101 The DIAMOND TIP of the pyramid GLINTS in Jonathan's eyes. He quickly reaches over and grabs it just as the whole da pyramid is SUCKED DOWN INTO THE EARTH. CUT WIDE: The blimp rises up just as the massive wave of foliage CRASHES DOWN, a near miss. With one last mighty R all the foliage is SUCKED INTO THE EARTH, --WHUMP!! And then the oasis is gone. Completely obliterated. Everything goes dead quiet. The blimp rises above a valle of dusty, sandy desert that was once the Oasis of Ahm She INT. BLIMP — DAY Jonathan crashes to the floor of the boat, clinging to th big chunk of polished. diamond that was once the tip of t pyramid, he hugs it tightly, grinning to himself. Evy and Alex run up and hug Izzy and thank him profusely. Izzy is both pleased and embarrassed by all the attention Then he sees O’Connell slumped up against the wall of the trawler, wincing and looking really beat-to-shit. Izzy O'Connell! You look like somethin’ My cat coughed up! Who the heli you been messin’ with this time?

A lone rider stands ou O'Connell steps up to the railing. Evy, Alex and Jonathan come up and flank him. They all look down. EXT. DUNES — DAY Ardeth Bey sits on a horse. He smiles up at his friends i the s. And then with an open palm he touches his heart an waves it towards the sun.

dialogues.speaker: ARDETH BEY
dialogues.text: Harum bara shad. Thank you again, ny friends. EXT. BLIMP — DAY O’Connell salutes him. Evy waves. Then O’Connell looks at Evy.

dialogues.speaker: O'CONNELL

dialogues.text: Oh PU-LEEEZE! Izzy grins, turns the wheel and throttles up. The blimp sails off into the SUNSET.
